        @POST
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response addTamtam(@FormParam(value="name")
                                                  java.lang.String name,
                                                  @FormParam(value="description")
                                                  java.lang.String description,
                                                  @FormParam(value="image")
                                                  java.lang.String image,
                                                  @FormParam(value="brand")
                                                  java.lang.String brand,
                                                  @FormParam(value="wood")
                                                  java.lang.String wood,
                                                  @FormParam(value="skin")
                                                  java.lang.String skin,
                                                  @FormParam(value="price")
                                                  java.lang.Double price,
                                                  @FormParam(value="decorations")
                                                  org.json.JSONArray decorations,
                                                  @FormParam(value="shipments")
                                                  org.json.JSONArray shipments)
        (POST) Add a tamtam to the showcase
        Parameters:
        name - String (FORM) name of the tamtam
        description - String (FORM) description of the tamtam
        image - String (FORM) image of the tamtam
        brand - String (FORM) brand of the tamtam
        wood - String (FORM) wood used by the tamtam
        skin - String (FORM) skin used by the tamtam
        price - Double (FORM) price of the tamtam
        decorations - JSONArray (FORM) Decorations available
        shipments - JSONArray (FORM) Shipments available
        Returns:
        Response
